◆ Use soap.
◆ The hands should be rubbed well. It is 
important to clean the nails, between the 
fingers and on top of the hands. Soap should 
be washed off well and the hands dried with a clean cloth.  
✱  When do we HAVE to wash hands?
◆  After using the toilet 
◆  When handling foods, before and after eating.
◆  After caring for sick persons and small children.
◆  When hands are dirty.
◆ When arriving home from work or from outside.
37
Skin :  The skin is important because it protects our bodies. Keeping the skin clean 
keeps a person healthy. 
Simple ways of keeping the skin clean are:
✱  Regular bathing at least once a day. Adults should pay special attention to 
clean in the folds of the skin – under the breasts, the armpits, the groin, 
between the toes. Adolescents (children between 11 and 18 years) should 
wash their faces more frequently
